=== Progress from last week ===

* filestore: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/filestore/+bug/896684|batch_import_iter() should call a progress callback]]</nowiki>
* filestore: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/filestore/+bug/901640|documentation update]]</nowiki>
* usercouch: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/usercouch/+bug/901656|Need to support no-auth, basic auth, and oauth]]</nowiki>
* microfiber: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/microfiber/+bug/901919|Port unit tests to changes in UserCouch]]</nowiki>
* Lots of work getting our !WebKit GStreamer integration sorted out - this is what's holding us back from showing the live preview of your edit displayed in the UI
* James is almost done with the revamped Dmedia importer and bowser layout, should land in the daily builds in the next few days
* David has been kicking ass on a slew of editor mockups, getting the concepts clear
* Jason started work on a low-detla change from CouchDB 1.1.1 in Debian to just add the couchdb/couchdb-bin split, goal of getting this upstream into Debian, not carry any Ubuntu-specific changes in Ubuntu

=== Plans for this week ===

* Getting <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/couchdb/+bug/817656|couchdb/couchdb-bin]]</nowiki> split packaging changes upstream into Debian
* python3-dbus is ready for testing in <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~barry/+archive/python|ppa:barry/python]]</nowiki> - after we test a bit, we'll copy into <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~novacut/+archive/daily|ppa:novacut/daily]]</nowiki> and start on <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/dmedia/+bug/898325|Dmedia bug 898325]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://pomfort.com/silverstack/setedition.html|Silverstack SET]]</nowiki> is the closest to Dmedia we've come across, will play with the 2 week free trial starting this week
* Jason didn't have a chance to get feedback from Novacut Artist Diaries on current tagging and project design, will do this week
* Make a case in the Blender forums for using Dmedia in Mango!
